price: Эндими? Олдин исён қилгандинг ва бузғунчилардан бўлгандинг-ку?!
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
